title: Bharata natyam
creator_credit: Documentary Films of India, M. Bhavnani and Jagat Murari
brief_description: Demonstrates one of the classical dance forms of South India, Bharata Natyam with dances performed by Kumari Kamala. A fascinating account of how body gestures of this South Indian dance is virtually a language for each expression and facet of human emotion.
creator_credit_for_label: Documentary Films of India, M. Bhavnani and Jagat Murari
